verses.verse: Afterward he <S%H935>brought<s%> me to the <S%H1964>temple,<s%> and <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H352>posts,<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H7341>broad<s%> on the one <S%H6311>side,<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H7341>broad<s%> on the <S%H6311>other<s%> side, which was the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle.<s%>

And the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of the <S%H6607>door<s%> was <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H520>cubits;<s%> and the <S%H3802>sides<s%> of the <S%H6607>door<s%> were <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> on the one side, and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> on the <S%H6311>other<s%> side: and he <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H753>length<s%> thereof, <S%H705>forty<s%> <S%H520>cubits:<s%> and the <S%H7341>breadth,<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

Then <S%H935>went<s%> he <S%H6441>inward,<s%> and <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H352>post<s%> of the <S%H6607>door,<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H520>cubits;<s%> and the <S%H6607>door,<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H520>cubits;<s%> and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of the <S%H6607>door,<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

So he <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H753>length<s%> thereof, <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits;<s%> and the <S%H7341>breadth,<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> <S%H413>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H1964>temple:<s%> and he <S%H559>said<s%> to me, <S%H2088>This<s%> is the <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> place.

After he <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H7023>wall<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H520>cubits;<s%> and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of every <S%H6763>side<s%> <S%H6763>chamber,<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about the <S%H1004>house<s%> on <S%H5437>every<s%> <S%H5439>side.<s%>

And the <S%H6763>side<s%> <S%H6763>chambers<s%> were <S%H7969>three,<s%> one <S%H413>over<s%> another, and <S%H7970>thirty<s%> in <S%H6471>order;<s%> and they <S%H935>entered<s%> into the <S%H7023>wall<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was of the <S%H1004>house<s%> for the <S%H6763>side<s%> <S%H6763>chambers<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about, that they might <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H270>hold,<s%> but they <S%H1961>had<s%> not <S%H270>hold<s%> in the <S%H7023>wall<s%> of the <S%H1004>house.<s%>

And there was an <S%H7337>enlarging,<s%> and a <S%H5437>winding<s%> about still <S%H4605>upward<s%> to the <S%H6763>side<s%> <S%H6763>chambers:<s%> for the <S%H4141>winding<s%> about of the <S%H1004>house<s%> went still <S%H4605>upward<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about the <S%H1004>house:<s%> <S%H5921>therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> was still <S%H4605>upward,<s%> and so <S%H5927>increased<s%> from the <S%H8481>lowest<s%> chamber to the <S%H5945>highest<s%> by the <S%H8484>middle.<s%>

I <S%H7200>saw<s%> also the <S%H1364>height<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about: the <S%H4328>foundations<s%> of the <S%H6763>side<s%> <S%H6763>chambers<s%> were a <S%H4393>full<s%> <S%H7070>reed<s%> of <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H679>great<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

The <S%H7341>thickness<s%> of the <S%H7023>wall,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> was for the <S%H6763>side<s%> <S%H6763>chamber<s%> <S%H2351>without,<s%> was <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits:<s%> and that which was <S%H5117>left<s%> was the <S%H1004>place<s%> of the <S%H6763>side<s%> <S%H6763>chambers<s%> that were <S%H1004>within.<s%>

And <S%H996>between<s%> the <S%H3957>chambers<s%> was the <S%H7341>wideness<s%> of <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about the <S%H1004>house<s%> on <S%H5437>every<s%> <S%H5439>side.<s%>

And the <S%H6607>doors<s%> of the <S%H6763>side<s%> <S%H6763>chambers<s%> were <S%H1870>toward<s%> the place that was <S%H5117>left,<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6607>door<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H6828>north,<s%> and <S%H259>another<s%> <S%H6607>door<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H1864>south:<s%> and the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of the <S%H4725>place<s%> that was <S%H5117>left<s%> was <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about.

Now the <S%H1146>building<s%> that was <S%H413>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H1508>separate<s%> place at the <S%H6285>end<s%> <S%H1870>toward<s%> the <S%H3220>west<s%> was <S%H7657>seventy<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H7341>broad;<s%> and the <S%H7023>wall<s%> of the <S%H1146>building<s%> was <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H7341>thick<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about, and the <S%H753>length<s%> thereof <S%H8673>ninety<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

So he <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H1004>house,<s%> an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H753>long;<s%> and the <S%H1508>separate<s%> place, and the <S%H1140>building,<s%> with the <S%H7023>walls<s%> thereof, an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H753>long;<s%>
Also the <S%H7341>breadth<s%> of the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and of the <S%H1508>separate<s%> place toward the <S%H6921>east,<s%> an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits.<s%>

And he <S%H4058>measured<s%> the <S%H753>length<s%> of the <S%H1146>building<s%> <S%H413>over<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H6440>against<s%> the <S%H1508>separate<s%> place <S%H834>which<s%> was <S%H310>behind<s%> it, and the <S%H862>galleries<s%> thereof on the one side and on the <S%H6311>other<s%> side, an <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H520>cubits,<s%> with the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H1964>temple,<s%> and the <S%H197>porches<s%> of the <S%H2691>court;<s%>

The <S%H5592>door<s%> <S%H5592>posts,<s%> and the <S%H331>narrow<s%> <S%H2474>windows,<s%> and the <S%H862>galleries<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about on their <S%H7969>three<s%> stories, <S%H5048>over<s%> <S%H5048>against<s%> the <S%H5592>door,<s%> <S%H7824>paneled<s%> with <S%H6086>wood<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about, and from the <S%H776>ground<s%> up to the <S%H2474>windows,<s%> and the <S%H2474>windows<s%> were <S%H3680>covered;<s%>

To that <S%H5921>above<s%> the <S%H6607>door,<s%> even to the <S%H6442>inner<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H2351>without,<s%> and by <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H7023>wall<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about <S%H6442>within<s%> and <S%H2435>without,<s%> by <S%H4060>measure.<s%>

And it was <S%H6213>made<s%> with <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> and <S%H8561>palm<s%> trees, so that a <S%H8561>palm<s%> tree was <S%H996>between<s%> a <S%H3742>cherub<s%> and a <S%H3742>cherub;<s%> and every <S%H3742>cherub<s%> had <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H6440>faces;<s%>

So that the <S%H6440>face<s%> of a <S%H120>man<s%> was <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H8561>palm<s%> tree on the one side, and the <S%H6440>face<s%> of a <S%H3715>young<s%> <S%H3715>lion<s%> <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H8561>palm<s%> tree on the <S%H6311>other<s%> side: it was <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H413>through<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> about.

From the <S%H776>ground<s%> to <S%H5921>above<s%> the <S%H6607>door<s%> were <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> and <S%H8561>palm<s%> trees <S%H6213>made,<s%> and on the <S%H7023>wall<s%> of the <S%H1964>temple.<s%>

The <S%H4201>posts<s%> of the <S%H1964>temple<s%> were <S%H7251>squared,<s%> and the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H6944>sanctuary;<s%> the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of the one as the <S%H4758>appearance<s%> of the other.

The <S%H4196>altar<s%> of <S%H6086>wood<s%> was <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H520>cubits<s%> <S%H1364>high,<s%> and the <S%H753>length<s%> thereof <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H520>cubits;<s%> and the <S%H4740>corners<s%> thereof, and the <S%H753>length<s%> thereof, and the <S%H7023>walls<s%> thereof, were of <S%H6086>wood:<s%> and he <S%H1696>said<s%> to me, <S%H2088>This<s%> is the <S%H7979>table<s%> that is <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
And the <S%H1964>temple<s%> and the <S%H6944>sanctuary<s%> had <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1817>doors.<s%>

And the <S%H1817>doors<s%> had <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1817>leaves<s%> apiece, <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H4142>turning<s%> <S%H1817>leaves;<s%> <S%H8147>two<s%> leaves for the <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1817>door,<s%> and <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H1817>leaves<s%> for the <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H1817>door.<s%>

And there were <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H413>on<s%> them, <S%H413>on<s%> the <S%H1817>doors<s%> of the <S%H1964>temple,<s%> <S%H3742>cherubim<s%> and <S%H8561>palm<s%> trees, like as were <S%H6213>made<s%> on the <S%H7023>walls;<s%> and there were <S%H5645>thick<s%> <S%H6086>planks<s%> on the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H197>porch<s%> <S%H2351>without.<s%>

And there were <S%H331>narrow<s%> <S%H2474>windows<s%> and <S%H8561>palm<s%> trees on the one side and on the <S%H6311>other<s%> side, <S%H413>on<s%> the <S%H3802>sides<s%> of the <S%H197>porch,<s%> and on the <S%H6763>side<s%> <S%H6763>chambers<s%> of the <S%H1004>house,<s%> and thick <S%H5646>planks.<s%>
